title: How to Add More Effects, Overlays, and Borders in Pixlr–o–matic on Android

steps.headline: Launch Google Play.
steps.description: Just tap on the Google Play in your app drawer or on your home screen.

steps.headline: Search for Pixlr-o-matic.
steps.description: The first app in the results should be the one you choose.

steps.headline: Launch Pixlr-o-matic.
steps.description: Just tap on the shortcut icon on your home screen, or go to your app drawer and tap the icon there.

steps.headline: Select a photo you’d like to edit.
steps.description: You can either take a new picture using your phone’s camera or choose one saved locally on your phone’s memory.

steps.headline: Tap on the Film icon.
steps.description: On the editing screen, this is on the upper-right corner (right beside the Shuffle button). This will open the Store section.

steps.headline: Choose the photo effects you like.
steps.description: Inside the store, tap on the Filter, Overlay, and Border buttons on the upper part of the screen to switch between tabs.

steps.headline: Download the effects you want.
steps.description: Just tap on Download to get the effects you chose for your phone. You can only download photo effects by batch. If you only want a specific effect from a group, you’ll have to download the entire group.

steps.headline: Press your phone’s Back button.
steps.description: This will lead you back to the editing screen. The location of the Back button varies depending on your phone manufacturer.

steps.headline: Select the tab of the effect you downloaded.
steps.description: If you downloaded a border effect, then go to the Border tab to view your download.

steps.headline: Browse your effects.
steps.description: Just swipe to the right. Your most recent downloaded effects will be at the end of the list.

text: Get Pixlr-o-matic Launch Google Play. Just tap on the Google Play in your app drawer or on your home screen. Search for Pixlr-o-matic. The first app in the results should be the one you choose. Download and install the app. Just tap on Install. Get More Effects Launch Pixlr-o-matic. Just tap on the shortcut icon on your home screen, or go to your app drawer and tap the icon there. Select a photo you’d like to edit. You can either take a new picture using your phone’s camera or choose one saved locally on your phone’s memory. Tap on the Film icon. On the editing screen, this is on the upper-right corner (right beside the Shuffle button). This will open the Store section. Choose the photo effects you like. Inside the store, tap on the Filter, Overlay, and Border buttons on the upper part of the screen to switch between tabs. Download the effects you want. Just tap on Download to get the effects you chose for your phone. You can only download photo effects by batch. If you only want a specific effect from a group, you’ll have to download the entire group. Press your phone’s Back button. This will lead you back to the editing screen. The location of the Back button varies depending on your phone manufacturer. Select the tab of the effect you downloaded. If you downloaded a border effect, then go to the Border tab to view your download. Browse your effects. Just swipe to the right. Your most recent downloaded effects will be at the end of the list.
